intro: Seychellea sechellarum, commonly known as the Seychelles starfish plant, is a unique species native to the Seychelles islands. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its striking, star-shaped flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or coastal areas, thriving in well-drained soil and full sunlight. Its leaves are usually dark green and glossy, while the flowers range in color from white to pale pink. Seychellea sechellarum is noted for its ornamental value and is often cultivated in tropical gardens.
